participant_1.background:
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.
i ride my bicycle everywhere.
I'm a creative teacher who loves to ride my moped and share my passion for writing with my students.
i enjoy hiking and riding my bicycle.
i enjoy writing for long periods of time.

participant_2.background:
I love to listen to music while I'm working on my photography projects.
I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
i do not like my job.
I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather.
I enjoy a nice cup of coffee while listening to records on my record player.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Good! I'm just enjoying a nice walk outside. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just getting ready for a day of writing.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love to write too. What are you working on?
I'm working on a short story about a woman who moves to a new city and has to start over.
That sounds really interesting! I love stories about new beginnings.
Thanks! I'm excited to finish it.
I'm sure it will be great! What's your favorite thing about writing?
I love being able to create my own world and characters. It's so much fun to be able to explore different possibilities and tell stories that people can connect with.
That's a great way to look at it! I love that you can use writing to express yourself and share your creativity with others.
Me too! It's such a rewarding experience.
I'm glad to hear that you enjoy writing. It's a wonderful hobby.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so too.
